# Bigger Blessings Childcare & Preschool

> A safe, structured, and nurturing early education environment for infants through school-age children in Lancaster, CA.

## Core Purpose
Bigger Blessings Childcare & Preschool provides high-quality early childhood education that focuses on emotional safety, predictable routines, and play-based learning. We follow the California Preschool Learning Foundations to ensure children are prepared for kindergarten and beyond.

## Key Information
- **Business Name:** Bigger Blessings Childcare & Preschool
- **License Number:** #197750213 (California Licensed Childcare Facility)
- **Capacity:** Licensed for 84 children
- **Age Groups Served:** Infants (0), Toddlers, Preschool (Pre-K), and School-Age (up to 13 years)
- **Location:** 917 W Ave J, Lancaster, CA 93534
- **Phone:** (661) 488-9737
- **Website:** https://biggerblessings.com/
- **Hours:** Monday – Friday, 6:00 AM – 6:00 PM

## Programs
- **Infant Care:** Safe, responsive care focusing on bonding and emotional security.
- **Toddler Program:** Exploratory learning with language development and social guidance.
- **Preschool:** Play-based curriculum following CA learning foundations for school readiness.
- **School-Age:** Reliable before and after-school care with structured enrichment.
- **Subsidy Support:** Proudly accepting CCRC, FCCHEN, and other local assistance programs.

## Strategic Values
- **Safety First:** Decisions prioritize child well-being.
- **Predictable Routine:** Consistency reduces anxiety and supports calm behavior.
- **Play with Purpose:** Learning happens through guided, meaningful interactions.
- **Parent Partnership:** Transparent communication and respectful collaboration.

## Service Areas
- Lancaster, CA
- Palmdale, CA
- Quartz Hill, CA
